heading: Services I Offer
subheading: Comprehensive payroll & compliance services, automation and audits ‚Äî tailored for Indian regulations across multiple states.

services.title: End-to-End Payroll Processing
services.summary: Monthly & annual payroll processing with tax and payslips.
services.details: Attendance, salary calc, TDS, reimbursements, adjustments and reconciliation. Multi-state & multi-company.

services.title: Statutory Compliance & Filings
services.summary: PF, ESIC, Bonus, Gratuity, LWF filings & records.
services.details: Registrations, returns, audits, and coordination with EPFO/ESIC/NPS portals.

services.title: Payroll Automation & Reporting
services.summary: Automations using Excel VBA & Power Automate + dashboards.
services.details: Macros, flows, reporting templates, Excel dashboards & scheduled reports.

services.title: Vendor & Statutory Audits
services.summary: Vendor audits, statutory audits & inspections support.
services.details: Prep documents, reconcile findings & corrective actions. CLRA, Maternity Act, S&E rules.

services.title: Employee Benefits & Gratuity
services.summary: Benefits admin: food coupons, gratuity, leave encashment.
services.details: Vendor coordination, claims, and gratuity administration.

services.title: Portal Expertise (EPFO, NPS, Ascent)
services.summary: Hands-on with EPFO, ESIC, NPS CRA & Ascent portals.
services.details: Registrations, eKYC, contribution reconciliation, portal filings.
